name: Icy Sea
description: Clean and simple, but stylish. A blue and white checkerboard pattern on a black background. Inspired by the elegant yet classic design of a Shogi board, this style aims to make your website stand out with its unique color combination and pattern. The use of a grid layout makes the design easily scalable for various devices and screens. It's perfect for websites that want a sophisticated and modern look.
additional_info: Shogi Board v1.0 - A clean and elegant CSS style that brings the elegant design of a Shogi board to your website. With a black background and a blue and white checkerboard pattern, this design is perfect for websites that want a unique and sophisticated look. The design is made using the CSS grid layout, making it easily scalable across different devices and screens. Perfect for websites that want to stand out with a unique and professional design.
